item.title: Peking Roast Duck Set
item.name: Roast Duck Set
item.content: Including whole Quanjude Peking Duck, Pancakes, Scallions, Cucumbers, Sweet Sauce and Duck Soup. Research shows that Quanjude Peking Duck contains 16% to 25% protein and only 7.5% fat, most of which is unsaturated and low carbon fatty acid that aids digestion and the absorption of vitamins by the body. Duck fat compared with other animal fat contains lower cholesterol levels.

item.title: Peking Roast Duck Set (Half)
item.name: Half Roast Duck Set
item.content: Including a half Quanjude Peking Duck, Pancakes, Scallions, Cucumbers, Sweet Sauce and Duck Soup. Research shows that Quanjude Peking Duck contains 16% to 25% protein and only 7.5% fat, most of which is unsaturated and low carbon fatty acid that aids digestion and the absorption of vitamins by the body. Duck fat compared with other animal fat contains lower cholesterol levels.
